mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM RM, R.RES_CLI_ID, R.RES_HOST_ID, R.RES_IDX, --예약 번호 R.RES_BOARD_NO, --예약된 게시글번호 B.BOARD_ADDR1, B.BOARD_ADDR2, R.RES_DATE_START, R.RES_DATE_END, R.RES_LEVEL, --예약 상태 R.RES_CARE_NO, R.RES_REJ, --거절사유 R.RES_REQ_DETAIL FROM RESERVATION R INNER JOIN BOARD B ON R.RES_BOARD_NO=B.BOARD_NO WHERE R.RES_CLI_ID= #{MEM_ID} ORDER BY RES_DATE_START

SELECT ROWNUM RM, RES_CLI_ID, RES_HOST_ID, RES_IDX, RES_BOARD_NO, RES_DATE_START, RES_DATE_END, RES_CARE_NO, RES_REQ_DETAIL, ((RES_DATE_END - RES_DATE_START)+1)*B.BOARD_PRICE PRICE
FROM RESERVATION R INNER JOIN BOARD B ON R.RES_BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO WHERE RES_CLI_ID=#{MEM_ID} AND RES_LEVEL=3 AND SYSDATE> #{RES_DATE_END}

SELECT M.MEM_NAME, M.MEM_PHONE, R.RES_DATE_START, R.RES_DATE_END, R.RES_LEVEL, R.RES_CARE_NO, R.RES_REQ_DETAIL, R.RES_REJ, R.RES_IDX, R.RES_BOARD_NO FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN RESERVATION R ON M.MEM_IDX = R.RES_CLI_ID WHERE R.RES_HOST_ID = #{MEM_ID}
SELECT M.MEM_NAME, M.MEM_PHONE, B.BOARD_ADDR1, B.BOARD_ADDR2 FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN BOARD B ON M.MEM_IDX = B.BOARD_HOST_IDX WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO}
